subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ Russian owner, believes he one-upped the Knicks when his team plucked point guard Deron Williams from the Utah Jazz.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Nets’ Russian owner, believes he one-upped the Knicks when his team plucked point guard Deron Williams from the Utah Jazz.
